00023 class csys():
00024     """2D coordonate system data structure:
00025 
00026 Parameters:
00027     * label: it is the structure associated name
00028     * parent: the parent coordinate system (all systems have at least global as parent)
00029     * origin: a tuple containing the origin (with respect to the parent if it exists - if not to the global)
00030     * rotation: a float representing the angle of the Ox axis (with respect to the parent if it exists - if not to the global)
00031     """
00032     def __init__(self, 
00033                  origin, 
00034                  parent=None, 
00035                  rotation=None, 
00036                  label="global", 
00037                  type_="cartesian"):
00038     
00039         self.origin   = origin
00040         self.parent   = parent  
00041         self.rotation = rotation
00042         self.type_    = type_
00043         self.label    = label
00044 
00045         self.metadata={}
00046         # metadata: color, layer, visibility, integer coordinates on canvas, associated xml id/name/label?
00047 
00048     def isglobal(self):
00049         return self.label == "global"
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 class point():
00054     """2D point data structure:
00055 
00056 Parameters:
00057     * label: it is the structure associated name
00058     * parent: the parent point (if the point is obtained through a geometrical transformation)
00059     * transformation: the geometrical transformation object (if the point was obtained through one - not implemented)
00060     * coords: the coordinates of the point with respect to the coordinate system
00061     * csys: the coordinate system in which xy values are defined (if csys == None then it is considerate to be global)
00062     """
00063     def __init__(self, 
00064                  coords, 
00065                  parent = None, 
00066                  csys=None, 
00067                  transformation=None, 
00068                  label=None):
00069     
00070         self.coords         = coords
00071         self.parent         = parent    
00072         self.csys           = csys
00073         self.transformation = transformation
00074         self.label          = label
00075 
00076         self.metadata={}
00077 
00078 class segment():
00079     """2D segment data structure:
00080 
00081 Parameters:
00082     * label: it is the structure associated name
00083     * parent: the parent line (if the line is obtained through a geometrical transformation)
00084     * transformation: the geometrical transformation object (if the segment was obtained through one - not implemented)
00085     * coords: the coordinates of the point with respect to the coordinate system
00086     * point1 & point2: the points defining the line in the 2D plane
00087     """
00088     def __init__(self, coords, parent=None, transformation=None, label=None, point1=None, point2=None):
00089         self.coords=coords
00090         self.parent=parent      
00091         self.transformation=transformation
00092         self.label=label
00093 
00094         self.metadata={}
00095 
00096     def __len__(self):
00097         return "not implemented yet!"
